platformNotes.tiktok: Best for trends, faceless content, short-form. Algorithm favors new creators.
platformNotes.instagram: Reels algorithm similar to TikTok. Good for fitness/lifestyle.
platformNotes.youtube: Shorts are underrated. Long-form for tutorials/deep dives.
platformNotes.twitter: Sports takes, live reactions during games. Fantasy football gold mine.

contentCalendar.daily: Post 1-2 pieces (mix of fitness, finance, sports based on day)
contentCalendar.monthly: 1 progress update on Florida fund / side hustle journey

keyInsights.faceless: Protects privacy, easier to film, focus on value not personality
keyInsights.nostalgia: 2016 vs 2026 format is viral gold right now
keyInsights.authenticity: Your real journey > fake guru content
keyInsights.sports: Fantasy football season = massive engagement opportunity
keyInsights.affiliate: Every video can have monetization angle via links in bio
